42 - The Global Game of Crypto | Bruno Maçães Bruno Maçães is a political philosopher, the author of several books surrounding the different types of cultural civilizations that define the globe.

Bruno has a strong familiarity with crypto and recently wrote an article called “The Crypto State?” which explored the emergency of a new civilization in Crypto

We brought him on to help us understand what’s going on with the geopolitical shifts of the world, and what this means for crypto.

Bruno on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MacaesBruno

The Crypto State? https://www.city-journal.org/technological-developments-new-systems-of-governance

Book Trailer of History Has Begun: https://twitter.com/MacaesBruno/status/1303653609880551428?s=20

The World Game, Bruno's newsletter: https://brunomacaes.substack.com/

------
